description.value:
Granted by @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.familiar-abilities.Item.Path of the Tempest]

Your familiar summons winds that speed up and protect you. You gain a +10-foot status bonus to your Speed until the end of your turn. When you Stride this turn, you don't trigger reactions. In addition, you don't need to Stride before a @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Long Jump] this turn.

publication.title: Pathfinder Lost Omens: Tian Xia Character Guide
